title: Chennai: Under-Construction Flyover Collapses, Video Surfaces
comments: CowBelt is so corrupt...oh wait it's the most developed state nevermind then ! Lol

Seems to be a railway bridge (constructed by Southern Railways?). Locals can add more context.

Not that it matters, but Gobi ji also seems to be in TN visiting temples (2 Shiva temples, 1 Aranganatha Perumal temple) with some connection to Rama. Note that none of the grand temples in TN are for Rama.

> the beam was not seated and fell down

That would be considered a collapse
